snippet: Fernando Torres helped send Chelsea into the Europa League final with a 3-1 win over visiting Basel. Chelsea will play Benfica, which beat Fenerbahce, 3-1.
abstract: Chelsea defeats Basel, 3-1, to advance to Europa League soccer final; Benfica beats Fenerbahce, 3-1, to reach final; other soccer news and results noted.
lead_paragraph: Fernando Torres helped send Chelsea into the Europa League final with a 3-1 win over visiting Basel. Chelsea will play Benfica, which beat Fenerbahce, 3-1.

headline.main: Chelsea and Benfica in Soccer Final
